full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
=====================================================

**Title**
--------

* **English**: Network Solutions Supply Chain (NSSC) Refresh
* **French**: Actualisation de la Chaine d’approvisionnements des solutions de réseau (CASR)

**Tender Details**
-----------------

* **Reference Number**: SSC-24-00026149:T
* **Amendment Number**: 2
* **Solicitation Number**: BPM021207/26149
* **Publication Date**: March 21, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: April 26, 2024 2:00 PM EDT

**Procurement Overview**
-------------------------

This tender notification pertains to the Network Solutions Supply Chain (NSSC) Refresh, Amendment 2. The procurement seeks to refresh the existing supply chain for network solutions to meet the evolving needs of the Government of Canada.

**Business Requirements**
-------------------------

The procurement is governed by the following requirements:

* Competitive - Open Bidding
* Trade Agreements: Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Comprehensive Land Claim Agreement (CLCA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Set-Aside Program for Aboriginal Business (SPAB), Land Claim Set Asides (LCSA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Atlantic Procurement Agreement

**Eligibility**
---------------

Only Canadian businesses or businesses with a valid NAICS code are eligible to participate in this procurement.

**Contact Information**
-----------------------

* **Name**: Annie Goulet
* **Email**: [None]
* **Phone**: 613-408-8344
* **Fax**: 613-555-5555
* **Address**: 180 Kent St Ottawa, K1P 0B6, Canada

**Procurement Documents**
-------------------------

The tender documents are available for download from the following links:

* **English**: [https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download_public/BEF40ED2-0C5C-42E8-BED9-075E4AAA969
